channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Two rights groups are first Israeli voices to accuse Israel of genocide
Hospitals make record number of requests for doctors to work during strikes
Pastor and wife charged with $1m fraud after ‘God told him’ to sell crypto to his flock and spent it on vacations
Ex-officer who mistook a Black man's keys and phone for a gun gets 15 years to life for murder
AMD stock jumps on 3 catalysts, Boeing faces potential strike
Several hurt in shooting outside casino in Reno: Police
item.description: Several people were injured in a shooting outside a casino in Reno, Nevada, on Monday morning, officials said.

item.title: Where Trump's trade deals stand ahead of Aug. 1 deadline
item.description: President Trump and the European Union announced a trade deal on Sunday ahead of Mr. Trump's Aug. 1 tariff deadline. CBS News MoneyWatch correspondent...

item.title: Ghislaine Maxwell makes pitch to Supreme Court
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court should hear Ghislaine Maxwell's appeal of her 2021 sex trafficking conviction, her lawyers argued in a brief to the Supreme Cou...

item.title: WATCH: Passengers exit plane via emergency slide after aborted takeoff
item.description: Passengers evacuated onto the runway via emergency slide after an American Airlines flight aborted its takeoff on the runway in Denver on Saturday.

item.title: Trump says he's "allowed" to give Ghislaine Maxwell a pardon
item.description: President Trump was asked Monday in a meeting with British Prime Minister Keir Starmer whether or not he would consider pardoning Jeffrey Epstein's ac...

item.title: What to know about the CBS Texas flood relief benefit show
item.description: Join CBS News Texas and Chef Tim Love for a flood relief benefit show to help Hill Country rebuild.

item.title: 3 big bankruptcy risks to know before filing this August
item.description: Thinking of filing for bankruptcy now? Make sure you know the major risks that come with it before making a decision.

item.title: Heat indices could hit 120 as sweltering temperatures grip eastern half of US
item.description: More than 185 million people across most of the United States are on alert for widespread, dangerous heat on Monday.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: 7/28: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: Extreme heat threatens millions across the U.S. Also, Busta Rhymes talks career longevity.

item.title: It’s a year of rapid change, except when it comes to Trump’s approval numbers, AP-NORC polling finds
